name: Zebra Shirt
description: Replaces the shirt from the Bangkok Suit to a partial zebra patterned shirt. Choose from options.

options.name: Replace Starting Suit
options.tooltip: Replaces the Bangkok Starting suit without gloves when you spawn in on the main mission

options.name: Replace Mastery Suit
options.tooltip: Replaces The Bangkok Mastery reward suit with gloves to be used anywhere
